column4: Hi I am running 12.04, with ultrabook with Intel 4000 graphics. When I launch certain games eg bastion, I get absolutely no graphics, just the cursor and sound
Should I update to new kernel and if so what is best way to do so
updating kernel isnt going to help
and then install your graphics drivers
perhaps its not good enough to play games?
open terminal and run:  sudo apt-get update ; sudo apt-get upgrade
then you should have the newest terminal. Check the update GUI as well
recently I had to do the kernel update with the GUI
also you can use the terminal to find what kernel version you currently have
or you should see it in grub
